channel.title: ::yell?
channel.description:
Can someone post the code for the yell command. My server doesn't have it and I would appreciate it if someone would post it!!
Thanks.

Yell only lag your server and you can get spammed easier.

Well im not at home atm , I will post the right code if no one else have posted it till then.

@Jordiescape wrote:

^^ Woo, a hundred errors =]. When will people learn not to post the } at the beginning? Their isn’t even a need for a else statement their tbh.

item.title: ::yell?
item.dc:creator: @inferno_vann inferno vann
item.description:
@inferno_vann wrote:

[code]} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if ((muted == 1) || ((playerLevel[8] < 70 && playerLevel[9] < 70 && playerLevel[7] < 70 && playerLevel[10] < 70 && playerLevel[11] < 70 && playerLevel[12] < 70 && playerLevel[13] < 70 && playerLevel[14] < 70 && playerLevel[15] < 70 && playerLevel[16] < 70 && playerLevel[17] < 70 && playerLevel[18] < 70 && playerLevel[19] < 70 && playerLevel[20] < 70) && playerRights < 1)) {
            sendMessage("Get 70 in non combat skill to remove this message!");
        } else if ((muted == 0 && (playerLevel[8] >= 70 || playerLevel[9] >= 70 || playerLevel[7] >= 70 || playerLevel[10] >= 70 || playerLevel[11] >= 70 || playerLevel[12] >= 70 || playerLevel[13] >= 70 || playerLevel[14] >= 70 || playerLevel[15] >= 70 || playerLevel[16] >= 70 || playerLevel[17] >= 70 || playerLevel[18] >= 70 || playerLevel[19] >= 70 || playerLevel[20] >= 70) && playerRights == 0) || (playerRights >= 1)){
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }[/code]

Mine is kind of weird, if you don’t have 70 in non combat skill, then you get a random message everytime you yell. Ehh, you can edit that out. Enjoy.

Read full topic
